bibl.title: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Pedro Nogueira, November 26, 1952

div1.p: Hench discusses his travel plans to Cuba. He informs Nogueira that several representatives of U.S. medical schools want to place wreaths during the dedication ceremony of Camp Lazear.

div1.head: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Pedro Nogueira, November 26, 1952
div1.opener:
November 26, 1952
Dr. Pedro Nogueira
Marti 219, Marianao
Habana, Cuba
My dear Pedro:
div1.p:
I leave here by air Saturday noon, 1:40 p.m. and arrive by way of Miami, landing in
Havana at 9:03, flight 415, Sunday morning, November 30.

The word has gotten around in this country about the dedication and now four or
five medical schools want to have the privilege of joining in the ceremony. Three
or four deans of medical schools have written me asking if they can have an alumnus
in Havana place a wreath beneath one or another of the medallions and I have told
them to get in touch with you or with Doctor Rodriguez Exposito. As mentioned
previously, the Mayo Foundation has asked me to lay a wreath before the medallion
of Doctor Finlay. The University of Virginia has asked me to arrange to have a
wreath laid combining honors to Reed, Moran and Kean. I do hope that arrangements
can be made whereby these half dozen representatives can place the wreaths during
the ceremony.

I am very sorry that despite my long telephone conversation with Hanberry, he just
feels that he cannot come. I even tried to help arrange either for a Rochester
nurse or an Army nurse to meet him and take him down in a plane but apparently he
just can't come. Why not ask Agramonte's daughter, Mrs. Ames or Mrs. Moran to help
with the unveiling?
I am delighted to hear about the Finlay decoration. I shall keep that a secret.

Thank you very much for the photographs. I note that in the restored caseta you
did not use the old sliding window sash. I think the one remaining was original and
if you don't want it for the building, I would be very grateful to have it.
div1.closer: Sincerely, P. S. Hench, M.D. PSH:alc
